Literature.Title: Biological properties of structurally related alpha-helical cationic antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Scott MG, Yan H, Hancock RE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=29µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61(MIC=19µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H744(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H547(MIC=32µg/ml),Burkholderia cepacia ATCC 25416(MIC=>64µg/ml)
